title: About
job_description: I currently work remotely as a Software Engineer at Resultados Digitais.
like_description: I like almost everything related to technology, development and software architecture. Always willing to learn something new and to share knowledge.
interest_description: Data Science, Iot, serverless architecture and frontend development are subjects that interest me. It also draws my attention to work with processing large amounts of data and with solutions that impact large numbers of people.
